data.title: Apple web server security acknowledgements
data.meta_description: Apple publishes this article to acknowledge and thank those who reported potential security issues in our web servers. Credit is added after the issue has been identified and addressed.
data.text:
Apple publishes this article to acknowledge and thank those who reported potential security issues in our web servers. Credit is added after the issue has been identified and addressed.

For Apple web server security acknowledgements from previous years, see the end of this article.

Credits
